Author: eru
Content: And it looks like you would pay less interest.

Author: Tichy
Title: Ask YC: how to create Web 2.0 beta flares?
Content: Couldn't find a tutorial for the Gimp. What is the usual way to create them? If I steal them from somewhere, I won't have antialiasing...

Author: vikram
Content: I second that. Very good for deployment too.

Author: dpapathanasiou
Content:
Another way of thinking about this is: don't take a job where your compensation is tied to a finite metric.

E.g. jobs that are paid by the hour, or based on how many units of something you produce.

Author: dpapathanasiou
Content:
I'm in the same boat, one of those dreaded single (and non-genius) founders.

But she makes a good point about that: not knowing your partner well can lead to all kinds of trouble down the road.

Picking a co-founder is not something that should be done lightly.

Author: lkozma
Content: Sorry, but this is health-care going back to pre-1850 levels with a Web 2.0 interface. If this becomes widespread, it defeats the whole idea of 'pay according to your means, get treatment according to your needs', social solidarity, etc.
